 @Produces(value="application/octet-stream")
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/{file:.*.tf}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTerraform(@PathParam(value="subscription")

        Produce the Terraform configuration.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The related subscription.
        file - The target file name.
        Returns:
        the Response ready to be consumed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When Terraform content cannot be written.
